name: Super Elite Dragon Fighter Xtreme Generation Ultimate
name_original: Super Elite Dragon Fighter Xtreme Generation Ultimate
description:
Join the fight as an extreme fighter anime girl as you attempt to defeat a giant super elite dragon!

Controls
  • left mouse button - attack (can do up to 3 hits)
  • right mouse button - fireball
  • L-shift/space - roll
  • WASD - move
  • mouse - look
Credits
  • Adam Zeng - UI, Design
  • Michael Kajihara - Programming, AI
  • Rodrigo Okamoto - Programming
  • Katherine Clark - Programming
  • Matthew Zhang - Programming
  • Sounds from Freesound.org
  • Animations and models from Unreal Marketplace
